# ihpdr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ihpdr is to fetch data from the [International Hous Price Database](https://www.dallasfed.org/institute/houseprice#tab1), compiled 
by the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.

## Installation


And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kvasilopoulos/ihpdr")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how download raw data:

```{r example}
library(ihpdr)
download_raw()
```
